issue.title: [CF 123] Displaying Icons When Using Focus' Target
issue.body:
I often heal by setting my tank as Focus and then have casts that hit target=focus.  Since these are often DoT's I would like to see the Debuff on the Focus' Target as part of my TMW display.

I set the debuff spells correctly and when I have the TMW icon set to Target it displays correctly along with the timer.  When I change the target option in TMW to Focus' Target, it never displays.

Have others gotten this to work or is it just a placeholder for a future enhancement?

P.S.  Thanks for the most customizable and friendly addon for watching any buff, debuff, trinket, cooldown... or anthing else!!


> Posted by CurseForge user curse94z | Imported from CurseForge issue #123 | Raw

comments.body:
Focus' target is the target of your focus, (the boss or a trash mob if your focus is a tank). Just plain 'Focus' is the unit that you have set as your focus.

Edited Feb 18, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
